text: Mario Artali (18 November 1938 â€“ 1 January 2023) was an Italian businessman and politician. He was born in Bologna. He was a member of the Socialist Party (PSI). From 1972 to 1976, he served in the Chamber of Deputies. Artali died on 1 January 2023 in Milan. He was 84. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Italian businesspeople Category:People from Bologna Category:Politicians from Emilia-Romagna
